module_updates.notification:
IMPORTANT: There is a new critical update available.
Early distributions of the JDK 5.0 / NB 5.0 bundle included incorrect update center configurations. If you are seeing this message, your installation is most likely affected by this problem. To fix it, you will need to install a hot fix with new update center definitions.
Please go to the Update Center wizard and install the Update Centers module. You will be asked to restart the IDE after the module is installed. Then you should be able to connect to the standard update centers at netbeans.org and get access to all available updates.
We are sorry for the inconvenience.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: This module contains URLs to the default NetBeans update centers. This specific update addresses a problem with incorrect update center configurations introduced in the early JDK 5.0 / NB 5.0 bundle release. When installed, NetBeans IDE should be able to connect to the default update centers at www.netbeans.org.
